commands.explanation: Let me introduce myself and explain what I do.
I list all games user 1 and user 2 have in common (up to the 2,000 character limit). If you use `--force-update`, I'll save that list for both users.
If you cannot find your Steam ID (17 digit number), then contact an Admin for details.
I'll list all of your games (up to the 2,000 character limit).
